synapse_type.name: GABA_phasic_average
synapse_type.meta:notes: GABA Golgi to granule synapse from Daniel Ward's phd thesis (UCL, 2012; see page 67). This is the "average" synapse as measured from all (N=69) Goc-grc paired recordings, for direct and spillover connections alike.

meta:publication.meta:fullTitle: Ward, Daniel R. Golgi cell mediated inhibition in the cerebellar granule cell layer. PhD thesis, University College London, 2012.
